content: That's a great list of books. I'll definitely check some of them out. I'm particularly interested in "Man's Search for Meaning" by Viktor Frankl. I've heard great things about it. By the way, my chance encounter with my old friend from high school last week got me thinking about how our experiences shape our beliefs. He had a near-death experience and it completely changed his perspective on life and mortality. It made me realize that our beliefs can be influenced by our experiences and the people we meet.
